title: User Signup and Verification

Title: User Signup and Verification
Context: A technical blog platform named 'inovoid' for sharing and interacting with tech posts.

After clicking sign up, a mock-up overlay or state shows an 'Email Verification' prompt asking the user to check their inbox. Modern, tech-focused design.
